name: Breakfast Cake Bowl
preparation: In a microwave safe bowl, combine all cake ingredients.
Microwave on high until cooked through, 2–3 min.
Top with Sweet Dip and enjoy!
tips: Make your own flavoured yogurt using organic cane sugar and real fruit. A low-sugar alternative to store-bought—simply add to plain Greek yogurt and enjoy!
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: This is a Perfectly Balanced Plate

products.name: Power Up Vanilla Protein Blend (Pouch)
summary: Fuel up first thing and stay fuller longer with rich smooth-tasting vanilla blend. Made with pea and fava bean protein, this blend turns into a velvety shake (just mix with water or milk) or morning smoothie with a luscious creamy texture, not chalky like a lot of other protein powders. It’s made with heat-stable probiotics which means baking with benefits! Add to pancake, waffle, muffin, or cookie batters. Power up your morning with an extra boost from 20 g of plant-based protein and essential amino acids.

products.name: Apple Pie Spice
summary: Move over pumpkin spice; it's time for Apple Pie Spice to shine! Perfect for leveling up the taste of fall-inspired baking, it's also great on top of oatmeal, in a frothy late or smoothie – or anywhere you want a punch of apple pie flavour.

products.name: Cinnamon (Ground)
summary: A simple blend of organic cinnamon that brings the flavour. Great for baking, desserts, egg nog, or enhancing the taste of Middle Eastern and Indian dishes.

products.name: Summer Berry Sweet Dip Mix
summary: If you could capture sweet summer in a jar, this would be it. A tangy, fruity blend of raspberries, strawberries, hibiscus, and a touch of rooibos, Summer Berry works as a dip or seasoning for yogurt, oatmeal, smoothies, and more.
